import smpplib

def recv_handler(self, **args):

if __name__ == '__main__':
    client = smpplib.client.Client("127.0.0.1", 5100)
    client.connect()
    client.bind_transmitter(system_id="SYSID", password='password', system_type='TEST')
    client.send_message(source_addr_ton=0,
                        source_addr_npi = 5,
                        source_addr='MTN',
                        dest_addr_ton=smpplib.command.SMPP_TON_UNK,
                        dest_addr_npi = smpplib.command.SMPP_NPI_ISDN,
                        destination_addr='2783111111',
                        protocol_id=smpplib.command.SMPP_PID_RIP,
                        short_message="part1")

                        #sar_total_segments = 2,
                        #sar_segment_seqnum = 1,
                        #message_payload="part1")
    client.send_message(source_addr_ton=0,

                        source_addr='MTN',

                        dest_addr_npi = smpplib.command.SMPP_NPI_ISDN,
